videoSnippet.title: The Greatest Game Ever Played Against Magnus Carlsen
videoSnippet.description:
Search all my videos easy https://agadmator-library.github.io/

Photos by Lenart Ootes
Have a great day :)

Aronian, Levon (2793) - Carlsen, Magnus (2832
Altibox Norway Chess (chess24.com) [4] 2017.06.10
D10 Queen's Gambit Declined Slav defence

1.d4 d5 2.c4 c6 3.Nf3 Nf6 4.Nc3 e6 5.e3 a6 6.b3 Bb4 7.Bd2 Nbd7 8.Bd3 O-O 9.O-O Qe7 10.Bc2 Rd8 11.a3 Bxa3 12.Rxa3 Qxa3 13.c5 b6 14.b4 Ne4 15.Nxe4 dxe4 16.Bxe4 Rb8 17.Bxh7+ Kxh7 18.Ng5+ Kg8 19.Qh5 Nf6 20.Qxf7+ Kh8 21.Qc7 Bd7 22.Nf7+ Kh7 23.Nxd8 Rc8 24.Qxb6 Nd5 25.Qa7 Rxd8 26.e4 Qd3 27.exd5 Qxd2 28.Qc7 Qg5 29.dxc6 Bc8 30.h3 Qd5 31.Rd1 e5 32.Rd3 exd4 33.Qe7 Bf5 34.Rg3 Bg6 35.Qh4+

00:00 Hello Everyone!
00:44  Game Starts!
02:20 Completely New Game!
10:15  Pause the Video!
14:20 It was in this position!
15:50 Contributions!

ARE YOU EVEN USING THESE?? 

The 5th edition of Altibox Norway Chess is a 10-player round-robin that at the moment it was announced featured all of the world's Top 10 players headed, of course, by World Champion Magnus Carlsen. It takes place from 6-16 June in the Clarion Energy Hotel and the Stavanger Concert Hall in Stavanger.

Players receive 100 minutes for the first 40 moves, then 50 minutes for 20 moves, then 15 minutes for the rest of the game, with a 30-second increment from move 61. No draw offers are allowed. In case of a tie for first two blitz games are played, followed, if necessary, by Armageddon. Official website: norwaychess.no
